name: EDM HOP: Music Tiles Rush
description:
- EDM HOP: Music Tiles Rush! is a game that challenges your reflexes and reaction time.
- Play now and feel new EDM music challenges wherever you are.

***HOW TO PLAY***

1. Touch, hold and drag to 2 sides to control the ball to jump on the tiles.
2. Don't "fall" off the track!
3. Relax, enjoy EDM music and challenges designed specifically for each song.

The ball will dance to the beat of EDM music. Listen to the music, follow the melody and use your abilities to control the ball and overcome the challenge. Don't release your hand while playing!

All free! Play EDM HOP: Music Tiles Rush! today!
